div.h2: Reasons for rejecting a referral request

div.p: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system for reasons of rejecting or canceling a referral request. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416406003 (Procedure discontinued) and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 428119001 (Procedure not indicated (situation)) and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416064006 (Procedure not offered) and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416432009 (Procedure not wanted) and http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410521004 (Not to be done (qualifier value))
